name: Petscii Cave
description:
Hello adventurer! 

Welcome to the endless depths of the Petscii Caves! Search for treasure and other secret items... but beware! You are not alone in these caves...

This is my first time developing a game for the commodore 64, and I have loved every minute of it, not just the experience but the community as well. This game was particularly challenging because it was made for The C64 'Cassette 50' Charity Competition, which limits the memory usage to below $1000 hex (just 4000 bytes!). 

After the competition has ended, the download will be made available.
